title: With which level is a account available to get the chests by getting an s?
body:
My friend has a level 5 accont, he is a new player and i helped him a bit. But in fact, he didnt get a chest as i got my s, although he owns the champ, he played. I think now, that depends on the level, that the player has and want to ask, with which level it is free to get chests. He has unlucked the loot-site, so i hought he could get it, but he didnt. 
Thank you for your answers
Hashtag22

replies.body:
i believe it was level 10

\#German Boards.

These Boards/Forum is 30248% in German.
So I would recommend you to either use the English Boards/Forum or start to write German here.

https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/

Ok dann kann ich ja Deutsch schreiben :DD
Danke dir
